name: Carter Wong Design
tagline: We believe in the impact of great design.
description:
The way Carter Wong Design approach and then solve a design brief hasn’t changed fundamentally in the 30 years since they set up. Be it for a small start-up or a large multinational, each and every solution is based on a clear understanding of the client and their particular business challenge.

They actively encourage teamwork and wholeheartedly  welcome client input to deliver the same level of care, attention to detail and crafting that they’ve been doing consistently for over 30 years.
